name: Sugar Rush (itch) (deahlt)
description:
Plop, plop, fizz, fizz Oh, what a Sugar Rush it is!

Had some fun putting together this cute, 2 lvl game. It's not a lot, but for a first timer in Unity, I'm super proud of it! Started as an assignment, ended in something nice. Hope you enjoy!

P.S: Maybe I'll add more in the future. I sorta got obsessed w these things.

Key Controls
  • WASD / Arrow Keys - move
  • W / Space - jump
Instructions

Download the zip file for your PC (avail. only on Windows as of now), un-zip it, and run the .exe file.

Thanks to Pixel Frog - itch.io for the cutest asset.
